questions.text: What is the name of Chuck's girlfriend?
What high school do Archie and the gang attend?
questions.explanation:
Riverdale.

	If you've read any Archie comics, I hope you got this one right!

questions.text: In their band The Archies, what instrument does Jughead play?
questions.explanation:
Drums.

	The full lineup--Archie on guitar and vocals, Reggie on guitar or bass, Jughead on Drums, Veronica on Keyboard, and Betty on Tambourine

questions.text: What is Mr. Lodge's first name?
What are the school colors of their high school?
questions.explanation:
blue and gold.

	It's also their school newspaper, the Riverdale Blue and Gold

questions.text: What letter is on Jughead's sweater?
questions.explanation:
S.

	No one knows what it means, either

questions.text: Which of the following is not a faculty member at their high school?
What is the name of the exclusive prep school outside of town that has a rivalry with the 'townies' of Archie's gang?
questions.explanation:
Pembrooke.

	Home of the incomparable Cheryl Blossom, who now has her own series.

questions.text: What is the name of Pop Tate's business?
questions.explanation:
The Chok'lit Shoppe.

	A Riverdale institution.

Ethel.

	If you haven't seen the movie Return to Riverdale, I suggest you check it out. Ethel plays a small part, but it's entertaining.

questions.text: Which character gets violent if someone even talks to his girlfriend?
questions.explanation:
Moose.

	I honestly don't know how Midge can put up with it.

questions.text: What does Reggie care about most?
questions.explanation:
Reggie.

	The 3 words in his vocabulary-me, myself, and I.

the school principal.

	I had to put something about Mr. Weatherbee in here!
